GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check for inline inode

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 7cfe2d43becaf76e562b9617d2c2d9b445f86761. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: fix to do sanity check for inline inode
